job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, and optimize scalable data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and managing data infrastructure.

job_tasks.justification: This indicates the application and incorporation of generative AI models into existing processes.

job_tasks.phrase: support the deployment of machine learning models
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the practical application and operationalization of trained models.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate GenAI technologies into analytics workflows
job_tasks.justification: Integrating technologies into workflows implies building or modifying software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: support the deployment of machine learning models
job_tasks.justification: Deployment often involves software engineering aspects to make models accessible and functional.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with data scientists and cross-functional teams
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the need for working with other teams and individuals.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with data scientists and cross-functional teams
drive innovation through cutting-edge AI solutions

classification.rationale: While the role mentions Generative AI and machine learning models, the primary focus is on data engineering and integrating existing AI technologies into workflows. The description lacks specific core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer such as prompt engineering, RAG systems, or fine-tuning. It leans more towards data infrastructure and supporting ML deployments.
